title: Come Out of Hiding
itunes:summary:
When things aren't going well in your marriage, having supportive friends is one of the best blessings you can have. None of us are meant to go through life isolated and alone. John talks with Greg and Erin about how they try to maintain community amidst their busy schedules. Featuring Dr. Tim and Noreen Muehlhoff.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "Defending Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-29?refcd=1427201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/come-out-of-hiding/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/the-spiritual-battle-for-your-marriage-digital/?refcd=1427201

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
